headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pegassi FCR
content: There are classy, vintage bikes - and then there’s the Pegassi FCR. Simple, timeless, distinctive; it’s everything the connoisseur could need. But if you’re more than a connoisseur, and you need to be uniquely chic, just take this thing of beauty to Benny’s Original Motor Works and let the magic happen. You ain’t seen nothing yet.
